mapper.insert: insert into GQPTZ_QXSJB (GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, NPJQW, JDZGQW, JDZDQW, XDSD, NJYLZDZ, NJYLZXZ, NJYL, NPJJYL, RZDJYL, NPJZFL, FX, FS, ZDFS ) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{npjqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdzgqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdzdqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xdsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{njylzdz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{njylzxz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{njyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{npjjyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rzdjyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{npjzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update GQPTZ_QXSJB set SCSJ = #{scsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NPJQW = #{npjqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDZGQW = #{jdzgqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JDZDQW = #{jdzdqw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XDSD = #{xdsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NJYLZDZ = #{njylzdz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NJYLZXZ = #{njylzxz,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, NJYL = #{njyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NPJJYL = #{npjjyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RZDJYL = #{rzdjyl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NPJZFL = #{npjzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FX = #{fx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS = #{fs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDFS = #{zdfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and GQPMC = #{gqpmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, GQPMC, SCSJ, NPJQW, JDZGQW, JDZDQW, XDSD, NJYLZDZ, NJYLZXZ, NJYL, NPJJYL, RZDJYL, NPJZFL, FX, FS, ZDFS from GQPTZ_QXSJB
